markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Qlippoth Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2454) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 62 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Riftmarked](/Feats.aspx?ID=2450)

</column>

---

You've deeply studied the secrets of your blood and can force reality to act against its own wishes. You can cast [_blur_](/Spells.aspx?ID=28) and [_silence_](/Spells.aspx?ID=287) once per day each as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
name: Qlippoth Magic
